direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve account details for sub-accounts but for different account types (margin vs. futures).
Both methods involve enabling or retrieving margin-related functionalities for sub-accounts.
Both methods involve operations related to margin accounts, such as enabling and transferring assets.

Environment setup is required before performing any sub-account operations, including margin account retrieval.
